text: Lincoln Junior High School Taft City School District is a school district headquartered in Taft, California. It was established in 1909. \- From image here stating that 1909 is the start date the superintendent is Julie Graves. ==Schools== ; Junior high school: Lincoln Junior High School ; Elementary schools * Conley Elementary School * Jefferson Elementary School * Parkview Elementary School * Roosevelt Elementary School * Taft Primary Elementary School ==See also== * Taft Union High School - operated separately * Taft College - Community college ==References== ==External links== * Taft City School District Category:School districts in Kern County, California Category:1909 establishments in California Category:Educational institutions established in 1909
title: Taft City School District
